verses.verse: Then <S%G1161><s%> Agrippa <S%G67><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%>, You <S%G4671><s%> are permitted <S%G2010><s%> to speak <S%G3004><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%>. Then <S%G5119><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> stretched forth <S%G1614><s%> his hand <S%G5495><s%>, and answered for himself <S%G626><s%>:

I think <S%G2233><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> happy <S%G3107><s%>, king <S%G935><s%> Agrippa <S%G67><s%>, because I shall <S%G3195><s%> answer for myself <S%G626><s%> this day <S%G4594><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G4675><s%> touching <S%G4012><s%> all the things <S%G3956><s%> whereof <S%G3739><s%> I am accused <S%G1458><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%>:

Especially <S%G3122><s%> because I know you <S%G4571><s%> to be <S%G5607><s%> expert <S%G1109><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> customs <S%G5037><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> questions <S%G1352><s%> which are <S%G2596><s%> among <S%G2453><s%> the Jews <S%G1485><s%>: therefore <S%G1189><s%> I beg <S%G4675><s%> you <S%G3116><s%> to hear <S%G191><s%> me patiently <S%G3450><s%>.

My <S%G3450><s%> manner of life <S%G3767><s%> <S%G99999><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> my youth <S%G3503><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> at <S%G575><s%> the first <S%G746><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> my own <S%G3450><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>, know <S%G2467><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%>;

Which knew <S%G4267><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> from the beginning <S%G509><s%>, if <S%G1437><s%> they would <S%G2309><s%> testify <S%G3140><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the most strictest <S%G196><s%> sect <S%G139><s%> of our <S%G2251><s%> religion <S%G2356><s%> I lived <S%G2198><s%> a Pharisee <S%G5330><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> I stand <S%G2476><s%> and am judged <S%G2919><s%> for <S%G1909><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> of the promise <S%G1860><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> our fathers <S%G3962><s%>:

Unto <S%G1519><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> promise our <S%G2257><s%> twelve tribes <S%G1722><s%>, earnestly <S%G1616><s%> serving <S%G3000><s%> God day <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> night <S%G3571><s%>, hope <S%G1679><s%> to come <S%G2658><s%>. For <S%G4012><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%>'s sake, king <S%G935><s%> Agrippa <S%G67><s%>, I am accused <S%G1458><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%>.

Why <S%G5101><s%> should it be thought <S%G2919><s%> a thing incredible <S%G571><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, that <S%G1487><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> should raise <S%G1453><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>?

I <S%G1473><s%> truly <S%G3767><s%> <S%G99999><s%> thought <S%G1380><s%> <S%G99999><s%> that I ought <S%G1163><s%> to do <S%G4238><s%> many things <S%G4183><s%> contrary <S%G1727><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3480><s%>.

This <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G4160><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> of the saints <S%G40><s%> did <S%G2623><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> shut up <S%G2623><s%> in prison <S%G5438><s%>, having received <S%G2983><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%>; and <S%G5037><s%> when they <S%G846><s%> were put to death <S%G337><s%>, I gave <S%G2702><s%> my vote <S%G5586><s%> against them <S%G2702><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I punished <S%G5097><s%> them <S%G846><s%> often <S%G4178><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> synagogue <S%G4864><s%>, and compelled <S%G315><s%> them to blaspheme <S%G987><s%>; and <S%G5037><s%> being <S%G1693><s%> exceedingly <S%G4057><s%> mad <S%G1693><s%> against them <S%G846><s%>, I persecuted <S%G1377><s%> them even <S%G2193><s%> <S%G99999><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> strange <S%G1854><s%> cities <S%G4172><s%>.

Whereupon <S%G3739><s%> as <S%G2532><s%> I went <S%G4198><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Damascus <S%G1154><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> commission <S%G2011><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%>,

At <S%G2250><s%> midday <S%G3319><s%>, O king <S%G935><s%>, I saw <S%G1492><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> a light <S%G5457><s%> from heaven <S%G3771><s%>, brighter <S%G5228><s%> than the brightness <S%G2987><s%> of the sun <S%G2246><s%>, shining round about <S%G4034><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> them <S%G3588><s%> which journeyed <S%G4198><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> me <S%G1698><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when we <S%G2257><s%> had all <S%G3956><s%> fallen <S%G2667><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, I heard <S%G191><s%> a voice <S%G5456><s%> speaking <S%G2980><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> in the Hebrew <S%G1446><s%> tongue <S%G1258><s%>, Saul <S%G4549><s%>, Saul <S%G4549><s%>, why <S%G5101><s%> persecute <S%G1377><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>? It is hard <S%G4642><s%> for you <S%G4671><s%> to kick <S%G2979><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> the pricks <S%G2759><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> rise <S%G450><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> I have appeared <S%G3700><s%> unto you <S%G4671><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> this purpose <S%G5124><s%>, to make <S%G4400><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> a minister <S%G5257><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> a witness <S%G3144><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> of these things which <S%G3739><s%> you have seen <S%G1492><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> of those things which <S%G3739><s%> I will show <S%G3700><s%> to you <S%G4671><s%>;

Delivering <S%G1807><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>, unto <S%G1519><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> I send <S%G649><s%> you <S%G4571><s%>,

To open <S%G455><s%> their <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%>, and <S%G3588><s%> to turn <S%G1994><s%> them from <S%G575><s%> darkness <S%G4655><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> light <S%G5457><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> from the power <S%G1849><s%> of Satan <S%G4567><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, that they <S%G846><s%> may receive <S%G2983><s%> forgiveness <S%G859><s%> of sins <S%G266><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> inheritance <S%G2819><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> them which <S%G3588><s%> are sanctified <S%G37><s%> by faith <S%G4102><s%> that is in <S%G1519><s%> me <S%G1691><s%>.
Whereupon <S%G3606><s%>, O king <S%G935><s%> Agrippa <S%G67><s%>, I was <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> disobedient <S%G545><s%> to the heavenly <S%G3770><s%> vision <S%G3701><s%>:

But <S%G235><s%> declared <S%G518><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> to them <S%G3588><s%> of <S%G1722><s%> Damascus <S%G1154><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> at Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> throughout <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the coasts <S%G5561><s%> of Judæa <S%G2449><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> then to the Nations <S%G1484><s%>, that they should repent <S%G3340><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> turn <S%G1994><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and do <S%G4238><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> meet <S%G514><s%> for repentance <S%G3341><s%>.

For <S%G1752><s%> these causes <S%G5130><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> caught <S%G4815><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>, and went about <S%G3987><s%> to kill me <S%G1315><s%>.

Having <S%G5177><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> obtained <S%G5177><s%> help <S%G1947><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, I continue <S%G2476><s%> to <S%G891><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>, witnessing <S%G3140><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> to small <S%G3398><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G3173><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> other things <S%G1622><s%> than <S%G5037><s%> those which <S%G3739><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> did say <S%G2980><s%> should <S%G3195><s%> come <S%G1096><s%>:

That <S%G1487><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> must <S%G3195><s%> suffer <S%G3805><s%>, and that <S%G1487><s%> he should be the first <S%G4413><s%> that should rise <S%G386><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>, and should proclaim <S%G2605><s%> light <S%G5457><s%> to the people <S%G2992><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to the Nations <S%G1484><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> as he <S%G846><s%> thus <S%G5023><s%> spoke for himself <S%G626><s%>, Festus <S%G5347><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, Paul <S%G3972><s%>, you are beside yourself <S%G3105><s%>; much <S%G4183><s%> learning <S%G1121><s%> does make <S%G4062><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> <S%G99999><s%> mad <S%G3130><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G5346><s%>, I am <S%G3105><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> mad <S%G3105><s%>, most noble <S%G2903><s%> Festus <S%G5347><s%>; but <S%G235><s%> speak forth <S%G669><s%> the words <S%G4487><s%> of truth <S%G225><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> soberness <S%G4997><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the king <S%G935><s%> knows <S%G1987><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> these things <S%G5130><s%>, before <S%G4314><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> freely <S%G3955><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> I am persuaded <S%G3982><s%> that none <S%G3756><s%> <S%G99999><s%> of these things <S%G5130><s%> are hidden from <S%G2990><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> this thing <S%G5124><s%> was <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> done <S%G4238><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a corner <S%G1137><s%>.
King <S%G935><s%> Agrippa <S%G67><s%>, believe you <S%G4100><s%> the prophets <S%G4396><s%>? I know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you believe <S%G4100><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> Agrippa <S%G67><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Paul <S%G1722><s%>, Almost <S%G3641><s%> you persuade <S%G3982><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> to be <S%G1096><s%> a Christian <S%G5546><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when he <S%G846><s%> had <S%G2036><s%> thus <S%G5023><s%> spoken <S%G2036><s%>, the king <S%G935><s%> rose up <S%G450><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the governor <S%G2232><s%>, and <S%G5037><s%> Bernice <S%G959><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> that sat <S%G4775><s%> with them <S%G846><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> when they were gone aside <S%G402><s%>, they talked <S%G2980><s%> between <S%G4314><s%> themselves <S%G240><s%>, saying <S%G3754><s%>, This <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G444><s%> does <S%G4238><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> of bonds <S%G1199><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> Agrippa <S%G67><s%> to Festus <S%G5347><s%>, This <S%G3778><s%> man <S%G444><s%> might have been <S%G1410><s%> set at liberty <S%G630><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> he had <S%G1941><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> appealed <S%G1941><s%> to Cæsar <S%G2541><s%>.
